original: śiṣyaḥ kumbhādi tat sarvaṃ dravam anyac ca śaktitaḥ /
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ kumbha ādi tat sarvam dravam anyat ca śaktitaḥ

original: dattvābhyarcya guruṃ natvā viprān saṃpūjya bhojayet // Hbhv_2.182 //
analyzed: dattvā abhyarcya gurum natvā viprān saṃpūjya bhojayet
śrī guroḥ brāhmaṇānām ca śubha āśīrbhiḥ samedhitaḥ

original: tān anujñāpya gurvādīn bhuñjīta saha bandhubhiḥ // Hbhv_2.183 //
analyzed: tān anujñāpya guru ādīn bhuñjīta saha bandhubhiḥ

original: iti dīkṣā-vidhānena yo mantraṃ labhate guroḥ /
analyzed: iti dīkṣā vidhānena yaḥ mantram labhate guroḥ

original: sa bhāgyavān cirañjīvī kṛta-kṛtyaś ca jāyate // Hbhv_2.184 //
analyzed: sa bhāgyavān cirañjīvī kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca jāyate
tathā ca saṃmohanatantre śrī śiva umā saṃvāde

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute martyaḥ kare tasya vibhūtayaḥ /
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute martyaḥ kare tasya vibhūtayaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ mahā-bhāge nānyat karmāsti bhūtale /
analyzed: atas param mahābhāge nā anyat karma asti bhū tale
yasya ācaraṇa mātreṇa sākṣāt kṛṣṇaḥ prasīdati

original: dīkṣāyā likhyate divyo vidhiḥ paurāṇiko 'dhunā // Hbhv_2.186 //
analyzed: dīkṣāyāḥ likhyate divyaḥ vidhiḥ paurāṇikaḥ dhunā
atha varāhapurāṇa ukta dīkṣā vidhiḥ
idānīm śṛṇu me devi pañca pātaka nāśanam
yajanam devadevasya viṣṇoḥ putra vasu pradam
iha janmani dāridrya vyādhi kuṣṭha ādi pīḍitaḥ

original: alakṣmīvān aputras tu yo bhavet puruṣo bhuvi /
analyzed: alakṣmīvān aputraḥ tu yaḥ bhavet puruṣaḥ bhuvi

original: tasya sadyo bhavel lakṣmīr āyur vittaṃ sutāḥ sukham // Hbhv_2.188 //
analyzed: tasya sadyas bhavet lakṣmīḥ āyuḥ vittam sutāḥ sukham

original: dṛṣṭvā tu maṇḍale devi devaṃ devyā samanvitam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu maṇḍale devi devam devyā samanvitam

original: nārāyaṇaṃ paraṃ devaṃ yaḥ paśyati vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_2.189 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇam param devam yaḥ paśyati vidhānataḥ
pūjitam nava nābhe tu ṣoḍaśa abja dale tathā
ācārya darśitam devam mantra mūrtim ayonijam

original: kārttike māsi śuddhāyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: kārttike māsi śuddhāyām dvādaśyām tu viśeṣataḥ

original: sarvāsu ca yajed devaṃ dvādaśīṣu vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_2.191 //
analyzed: sarvāsu ca yajet devam dvādaśīṣu vidhānataḥ
saṅkrāntau ca mahābhāge candra sūrya grahe pi vā

original: yaḥ paśyati hariṃ devaṃ pūjitaṃ guruṇā śubhe /
analyzed: yaḥ paśyati harim devam pūjitam guruṇā śubhe

original: tasya sadyo bhavet tuṣṭiḥ pāpa-dhvaṃso 'py aśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_2.192 //
analyzed: tasya sadyas bhavet tuṣṭiḥ pāpa dhvaṃsaḥ api aśeṣatas

original: sa sāmānyo hi devānāṃ bhavatīti na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_2.193 //
analyzed: sa sāmānyaḥ hi devānām bhavati iti na saṃśayaḥ
brāhmaṇa kṣatriya viśām śūdrāṇām ca parīkṣaṇam
saṃvatsaram guruḥ kuryāt jāti śauca kriyā ādibhiḥ
upasannān tatas jñātvā hṛdayena avadhārayet
te api bhaktimataḥ jñātvā ātmanaḥ parameśvaram

original: saṃvatsaraṃ guror bhaktiṃ kuryur viṣṇāv ivācalām // Hbhv_2.195 //
analyzed: saṃvatsaram guroḥ bhaktim kuryuḥ viṣṇau iva acalām

original: saṃvatsaraṃ tataḥ pūrṇe guruṃ caiva prasādayet // Hbhv_2.196 //
analyzed: saṃvatsaram tatas pūrṇe gurum ca eva prasādayet
bhagavan tvad prasādena saṃsāra arṇava tāraṇam

original: icchāmas tv aihikīṃ lakṣmīṃ viśeṣeṇa tapodhana // Hbhv_2.197 //
analyzed: icchāmaḥ tu aihikīm lakṣmīm viśeṣeṇa tapodhana

original: evam abhyarthya medhāvī guruṃ viṣṇum ivāgrataḥ /
analyzed: evam abhyarthya medhāvī gurum viṣṇum iva agratas

original: abhyarcya tad-anujñāto daśamyāṃ kārttikasya tu // Hbhv_2.198 //
analyzed: abhyarcya tad anujñātaḥ daśamyām kārttikasya tu
kṣīravṛkṣa samudbhūtam mantritam parameṣṭhinā
bhakṣayitvā śayīta urvyām devadevasya sannidhau

original: svapnān dṛṣṭvā guror agre śrāvayeta vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: svapnān dṛṣṭvā guroḥ agre śrāvayeta vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: tataḥ śubhāśubhaṃ tadvad ālapet paramo guruḥ /
analyzed: tatas śubha aśubham tadvat ālapet paramaḥ guruḥ

original: ekādaśyām upoṣyātha snātvā devālayaṃ vrajet // Hbhv_2.200 //
analyzed: ekādaśyām upoṣya atha snātvā devālayam vrajet

original: guruś ca maṇḍalaṃ bhūmau kalptāyāṃ tu vartayet /
analyzed: guruḥ ca maṇḍalam bhūmau kalptāyām tu vartayet

original: lakṣaṇair vividhair bhūmiṃ lakṣayitvā vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_2.201 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇaiḥ vividhaiḥ bhūmim lakṣayitvā vidhānataḥ

original: ṣoḍaśāraṃ likhec cakraṃ nava-nābham athāpi vā /
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa aram likhet cakram nava nābham atha api vā

original: aṣṭa-patram atho vāpi likhitvā darśayed budhaḥ // Hbhv_2.202 //
analyzed: aṣṭa patram atho vā api likhitvā darśayet budhaḥ
netra bandham prakurvīta sita vastreṇa yatnataḥ
varṇa anukramataḥ śiṣyān purṣpa hastān praveśayet

original: nava-nābhaṃ yadā kuryān maṇḍalaṃ varṇakair budhaḥ /
analyzed: nava nābham yadā kuryāt maṇḍalam varṇakaiḥ budhaḥ

original: tadānīṃ pūrvato devam indram aindryāṃ tu pūjayet // Hbhv_2.204 //
analyzed: tadānīm pūrvatas devam indram aindryām tu pūjayet
lokapālam atha āgneyyām agnim sampūjayet dvijaḥ

original: yamaṃ tad anu yāmyāyāṃ nairṛtyāṃ nirṛtiṃ nyaset /
analyzed: yamam tat anu yāmyāyām nairṛtyām nirṛtim nyaset

original: vāruṇyāṃ varuṇaṃ caiva vāyavyāṃ pavanaṃ yajet // Hbhv_2.205 //
analyzed: vāruṇyām varuṇam ca eva vāyavyām pavanam yajet
dhanadam ca uttare nyasya rudram aiśāna gocare
sampūjya evam vidhānena diś patreṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: adhaḥ-patre tathā viṣṇum arcayet parameśvaram // Hbhv_2.206 //
analyzed: adhas patre tathā viṣṇum arcayet parameśvaram

original: pūrva-patre balaṃ pūjya pradyumnaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā /
analyzed: pūrva patre balam pūjya pradyumnam dakṣiṇe tathā

original: aniruddhaṃ tathā pūjya paścime cottare tathā /
analyzed: aniruddham tathā pūjya paścime ca uttare tathā
pūjayet vāsudevam tu sarva pātaka śānti dam

original: aiśānyāṃ vinyasec chaṅkham āgneyyāṃ cakram eva ca /
analyzed: aiśānyām vinyaset śaṅkham āgneyyām cakram eva ca

original: saumyāyāṃ tu gadā pūjyā vāyavyāṃ padmam eva ca // Hbhv_2.208 //
analyzed: saumyāyām tu gadā pūjyā vāyavyām padmam eva ca

original: nairṛtyāṃ muṣalaṃ pūjyaṃ dakṣiṇe garuḍaṃ tathā /
analyzed: nairṛtyām muṣalam pūjyam dakṣiṇe garuḍam tathā

original: vāmato vinyasel lakṣmīṃ devadevasya buddhimān // Hbhv_2.209 //
analyzed: vāmatas vinyaset lakṣmīm devadevasya buddhimān

original: dhanuś caiva ca khaḍgaṃ ca devasya purato nyaset /
analyzed: dhanuḥ ca eva ca khaḍgam ca devasya puratas nyaset

original: śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ caiva devasya purato 'rcayet // Hbhv_2.210 //
analyzed: śrīvatsam kaustubham ca eva devasya puratas rcayet
evam pūjya yathānyāyam devadevam janārdanam

original: diṅ-maṇḍale ca vinyasya cāṣṭau kumbhān vidhānataḥ /
analyzed: diś maṇḍale ca vinyasya ca aṣṭau kumbhān vidhānataḥ

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ kalasaṃ caiva navamaṃ tatra kalpayet // Hbhv_2.211 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam kalasam ca eva navamam tatra kalpayet

original: snāpayen mukti-kāmāṃs tu vaiṣṇavena ghaṭena tu /
analyzed: snāpayet mukti kāmān tu vaiṣṇavena ghaṭena tu

original: śrī-kāmān snāpayet tadvad aindreṇātha ghaṭena tu // Hbhv_2.212 //
analyzed: śrī kāmān snāpayet tadvat aindreṇa atha ghaṭena tu
jaya pratāpa kāmān tu āgneyena abhiṣecayet
mṛtyuñjaya vidhānena yāmyena snāpanam tathā
duṣṭa pradhvaṃsnāya alam nairṛtena vidhīyate
śāntaye vāruṇyena atha pāpa nāśāya vāyavam
dravya sampatti kāmasya kauvareṇa vidhīyate

original: raudreṇa jñāna-hetus tu loka-pāla-ghaṭās tv ime // Hbhv_2.215 //
analyzed: raudreṇa jñāna hetuḥ tu lokapāla ghaṭāḥ tu ime
ekaikena naraḥ snātaḥ sarva pāpa varjitaḥ

original: bhaved avyāhata-jñānaḥ śrīmāṃś ca puruṣaḥ sadā // Hbhv_2.216 //
analyzed: bhavet avyāhata jñānaḥ śrīmān ca puruṣaḥ sadā

original: kiṃ punar navabhiḥ snāto naraḥ pātaka-varjitaḥ /
analyzed: kim punar navabhiḥ snātaḥ naraḥ pātaka varjitaḥ

original: jāyate viṣṇu-sadṛśaḥ sadyo rājāthavā punaḥ // Hbhv_2.217 //
analyzed: jāyate viṣṇu sadṛśaḥ sadyas rājā athavā punar
athavā dikṣu sarvāsu yathāsaṅkhyena lokapān

original: pūjayet sva-sva-nāmnā tu ṣaḍ-bhinnena vidhānataḥ // Hbhv_2.218 //
analyzed: pūjayet sva sva nāmnā tu ṣaṣ bhinnena vidhānataḥ

original: evaṃ sampūjya devāṃs tu loka-pālān prasanna-dhīḥ /
analyzed: evam sampūjya devān tu lokapālān prasanna dhīḥ

original: paścāt parīkṣitān śiṣyān baddha-netrān praveśayet // Hbhv_2.219 //
analyzed: paścāt parīkṣitān śiṣyān baddha netrān praveśayet
āgneya dhāraṇā dagdhān vāyunā vidhūtān tatas

original: somenāpy āyitān paścāc chrāvayen niyamān budhaḥ // Hbhv_2.220 //
analyzed: somena api āyitān paścāt śrāvayet niyamān budhaḥ

original: na ninded abrāhmaṇān devān viṣṇuṃ brāhmaṇam eva ca /
analyzed: na nindet abrāhmaṇān devān viṣṇum brāhmaṇam eva ca

original: rudram ādiyam agniṃ ca loka-pālān grahāṃs tathā /
analyzed: rudram agnim ca lokapālān grahān tathā

original: vandeta vaiṣṇavaṃ cāpi puruṣaṃ pūrva-dīkṣitam // Hbhv_2.221 //
analyzed: vandeta vaiṣṇavam ca api puruṣam pūrva dīkṣitam

original: evaṃ tu samayān śrāvya paścād dhomaṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: evam tu samayān śrāvya paścāt homam tu kārayet

original: tattvāni śiṣya-deheṣu vinyasya ca viśodhayet // Hbhv_2.222 //
analyzed: tattvāni śiṣya deheṣu vinyasya ca viśodhayet

original: oṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave sarva-rūpiṇe huṃ svāhā // Hbhv_2.223 //
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate viṣṇave sarva rūpiṇe hum svāhā

original: garbhādhānādikāś caiva kriyāḥ sarvāś ca kārayet // Hbhv_2.224 //
analyzed: garbhādhāna ādikāḥ ca eva kriyāḥ sarvāḥ ca kārayet

original: tato 'panīya dṛg-bandhaṃ puraḥ śiṣyaṃ niveśya ca /
analyzed: upanīya dṛś bandham puras śiṣyam niveśya ca

original: prāyaḥ pūrvokta-vidhinā mantraṃ tasmai gurur diśet // Hbhv_2.225 //
analyzed: prāyas pūrva ukta vidhinā mantram tasmai guruḥ diśet
homa ante dīkṣitaḥ paścāt dāpayet guru dakṣiṇām
hasti aśva ratna kaṭakam hema grāma ādikam nṛpaḥ

original: dāpayed gurave prājño madhyamo madhyamāṃ tathā /
analyzed: dāpayet gurave prājñaḥ madhyamaḥ madhyamām tathā

original: dāpayed itaro yugmaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ yathā-vidhi // Hbhv_2.227 //
analyzed: dāpayet itaraḥ yugmam sa hiraṇyam yathāvidhi

original: evaṃ kṛte tu yat puṇyaṃ māhātmyaṃ jāyate dhare /
analyzed: evam kṛte tu yat puṇyam māhātmyam jāyate dhare

original: tad aśakyaṃ tu gaditum api varṣa-śatair api // Hbhv_2.228 //
analyzed: tat aśakyam tu gaditum api varṣa śataiḥ api

original: dīkṣitātmā guror bhūtvā vārāhaṃ śṛṇuyād yadi /
analyzed: dīkṣita ātmā guroḥ bhūtvā vārāham śṛṇuyāt yadi

original: tena vedāḥ purāṇāni sarve mantrāḥ susaṅgrahāḥ // Hbhv_2.229 //
analyzed: tena vedāḥ purāṇāni sarve mantrāḥ su saṅgrahāḥ

original: japtāḥ syuḥ puṣkare tīrthe prayāge sindhu-sāgare /
analyzed: japtāḥ syuḥ puṣkare tīrthe prayāge sindhusāgare
deva hūte kurukṣetre vārāṇasyām viśeṣataḥ

original: graheṇa viṣuve caiva yat phalaṃ japatāṃ bhavet /
analyzed: graheṇa viṣuve ca eva yat phalam japatām bhavet

original: tat phalaṃ dviguṇaṃ tasya dīkṣito yaḥ śṛṇoti ca // Hbhv_2.231 //
analyzed: tat phalam dviguṇam tasya dīkṣitaḥ yaḥ śṛṇoti ca

original: devā api tapaḥ kṛtvā dhyāyanti ca vadanti ca /
analyzed: devāḥ api tapaḥ kṛtvā dhyāyanti ca vadanti ca

original: kadā me bhārate varṣe janma syād bhūta-dhāriṇi // Hbhv_2.232 //
analyzed: kadā me bhārate varṣe janma syāt bhūta dhāriṇi

original: dīkṣitāś ca bhaviṣyāmo vārāhaṃ śṛṇumaḥ kadā /
analyzed: dīkṣitāḥ ca bhaviṣyāmaḥ vārāham śṛṇumaḥ kadā
vārāham ṣoḍaśa ātmānam yuktāḥ dehe kadācana

original: paśyāmaḥ paramaṃ sthānaṃ yad gatvā na punar bhavet // Hbhv_2.233 //
analyzed: paśyāmaḥ paramam sthānam yat gatvā na punar bhavet

original: evaṃ jalpanti vibudhā manasā cintayanti ca /
analyzed: evam jalpanti vibudhāḥ manasā cintayanti ca

original: vārāha-yāgaṃ kārttikyāṃ kadā drakṣyāmahe dhare // Hbhv_2.234 //
analyzed: vārāha yāgam kārttikyām kadā drakṣyāmahe dhare

original: eṣa te vidhir uddiṣṭo mayā te bhūta-dhāriṇi /
analyzed: eṣa te vidhiḥ uddiṣṭaḥ mayā te bhūta dhāriṇi

original: deva-gandharva-yakṣāṇāṃ sarvathā durlabho hy asau // Hbhv_2.235 //
analyzed: deva gandharva yakṣāṇām sarvathā durlabhaḥ hi asau

original: evaṃ yo vetti tattvena yaś ca paśyati maṇḍalam /
analyzed: evam yaḥ vetti tattvena yaḥ ca paśyati maṇḍalam

original: yaś cemaṃ śṛṇuyād devi sarve muktā iti śrutiḥ // Hbhv_2.236 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca imam śṛṇuyāt devi sarve muktāḥ iti śrutiḥ
atha saṅkṣipta dīkṣā

original: saṅkṣiptaś cātha dīkṣāyā vidhir eṣa vilikhyate /
analyzed: saṅkṣiptaḥ ca atha dīkṣāyāḥ vidhiḥ eṣa vilikhyate

original: mukhya-kalpe hy aśaktasya janasya syād dhitāya ca // Hbhv_2.237 //
analyzed: mukhya kalpe hi aśaktasya janasya syāt hitāya ca
su muhūrte itha samprāpte sarvatobhadra maṇḍale
nūtanam gandha puṣpa ādi maṇḍitam kalasam nyaset
vastra āvṛtam payaḥ pūrṇam pañcapallava saṃyutam
sarva oṣadhi pañcaratna mṛtsnā saptaka garbhitam
mṛttikāḥ ca sapta uktāḥ
aśva sthānāt gaja sthānāt valmīkāt ca catuṣpathāt

original: rāja-dvārāc ca goṣṭhāc ca nadyāḥ kūlān mṛdaḥ smṛtāḥ // Hbhv_2.240 //
analyzed: rāja dvārāt ca goṣṭhāt ca nadyāḥ kūlāt mṛdaḥ smṛtāḥ
iti

original: kṛṣṇam abhyarcya taṃ kumbhaṃ kuśa-kūrcena deśikaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam abhyarcya tam kumbham kuśa kūrcena deśikaḥ

original: deya-mantreṇa sāṣṭaṃ tu sahasram abhimantrayet // Hbhv_2.241 //
analyzed: deya mantreṇa sāṣṭam tu sahasram abhimantrayet

original: tad-adbhiḥ pūrvavac chiṣyam abhiṣicya diśen manum /
analyzed: tad adbhiḥ pūrvavat śiṣyam abhiṣicya diśet manum

original: śiṣyo 'rcayed guruṃ bhaktyā yathā-śakti dvijān api // Hbhv_2.242 //
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ urcayet gurum bhaktyā yathāśakti dvijān api
atha upadeśaḥ tattvasāgare

original: atrāpy aśaktaḥ kaścic ced abjam abhyarcya sākṣatam /
analyzed: atrā api aśaktaḥ kaścid ced abjam abhyarcya sa akṣatam

original: tad-ambhasābhiṣicyāṣṭa vārān mūlena ke karam // Hbhv_2.243 //
analyzed: tad ambhasā abhiṣicya aṣṭau vārān mūlena ke karam

original: nidhāyāmuṃ japet karṇe upadeśeṣv ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
analyzed: nidhāya amum japet karṇe upadeśeṣu ayam vidhiḥ
candra sūrya grahe tīrthe siddha kṣetre śivālaye
mantra mātra prakathanam upadeśaḥ saḥ ucyate
tatra tatra eva viśeṣaḥ śrī nāradapañcarātre
vitta lobhāt vimuktasya su alpa vittasya dehinaḥ
saṃsāra bhaya bhītasya viṣṇu bhaktasya tattvataḥ

original: agnāv ājyānvite bījaiḥ salilaiḥ kevalaiś ca vā /
analyzed: agnau ājya anvite bījaiḥ salilaiḥ kevalaiḥ ca vā
dravya hīnasya kurvīta vacasā anugraham guruḥ
yaḥ samaḥ sarva bhūteṣu virāgaḥ vīta matsaraḥ
jita indriyaḥ śuciḥ dakṣaḥ sarva aṅga avayava anvitaḥ

original: karmaṇā manasā vācā bhīte cābhayadaḥ sadā /
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā bhīte ca abhaya daḥ sadā
sama buddhi padam prāptaḥ tatra api bhagavat mayaḥ
pañca kāla paraḥ ca eva pañcarātra artha vid tathā

pāda udakasya māhātmyam devaḥ jānāti śaśkaraḥ
viṣñu pāda cyutā gaśgā śirasā yena dhāritā

original: sthānaṃ naivāsti pāpasya dehināṃ deha-madhyataḥ // Hbhv_9.63 //
analyzed: sthānam na evā asti pāpasya dehinām deha madhyatas
sa bāhya abhyantaram yasya vyāptam pāda udakena vai

original: pādodaṃ viṣñu-naivedyam udare yasya tiṣṭhati // Hbhv_9.64 //
analyzed: pāda udam viṣñu naivedyam udare yasya tiṣṭhati

original: nāśrayaṃ labhate pāpaṃ svayam eva vinaśyati /
analyzed: na āśrayam labhate pāpam svayam eva vinaśyati
mahā pāpa graha grastaḥ vyāptaḥ roga śataiḥ yadi

original: hareḥ pādodakaṃ pṚtvā mucyate nātra saṃsayaḥ /
analyzed: hareḥ pāda udakam pṛtvā mucyate na atra saṃsayaḥ

original: śirasā tiṣṭhate yeṣāṃ nityaṃ pādodakaṃ hareḥ // Hbhv_9.66 //
analyzed: śirasā tiṣṭhate yeṣām nityam pāda udakam hareḥ
kim kariṣyati te loke tṛrtha koṭi manorathaiḥ

original: ayam eva paro dharma idam eva paraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: ayam eva paraḥ dharmaḥ idam eva param tapaḥ

original: idam eva paraṃ tṚrthaṃ viṣñu-pādāmbu yat pibet // Hbhv_9.67 //
analyzed: idam eva param tṛrtham viṣñu pāda ambu yat pibet
tatra eva

original: vilayaṃ yānti pāpāni pṚte pādodake hareḥ /
analyzed: vilayam yānti pāpāni pṛte pāda udake hareḥ
kim punar viṣñu pāda udam śālagrāma śilā cyutam
viśeṣena haret pāpam brahmahatyā ādikam priye

original: pṚte pādodake viṣñor yadi prāñair vimucyate /
analyzed: pṛte pāda udake viṣñoḥ yadi prāñaiḥ vimucyate

original: hatvā yama-bhaṭān sarvān vaiṣñavaṃ lokam āpnuyāt // Hbhv_9.69 //
analyzed: hatvā yama bhaṭān sarvān vaiṣñavam lokam āpnuyāt
tatra eva śrṛ śiva kārttikeya saṃvāde śrṛ śālagrāma śilā māhātmye
chinnaḥ tena mahā sena garbhāvāsaḥ su dāruñaḥ

original: pṚtaṃ yena sadā viṣñoḥ śālagrāma-śilā-jalam // Hbhv_9.70 //
analyzed: yena sadā viṣñoḥ śālagrāma śilā jalam
ye pibanti narāḥ nityam śālagrāma śilā jalam

original: pañca-gavya-sahasrais tu prāśitaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam // Hbhv_9.71 //
analyzed: pañcagavya sahasraiḥ tu prāśitaiḥ kim prayojanam

original: prāyaścitte samutpanne kiṃ dānaiḥ kim upoṣañaiḥ /
analyzed: prāyaścitte samutpanne kim dānaiḥ kim upoṣañaiḥ

original: cāndrāyañaiś ca tṚrthaiś ca pṚtvā pādodakaṃ śuci // Hbhv_9.72 //
analyzed: cāndrāyañaiḥ ca tṛrthaiḥ ca pṛtvā pāda udakam śuci
bṛhat nāradiye lubdhaka upākhyāna ārambhe

original: hari-pādodakaṃ yas tu kṣaña-mātraṃ ca dhārayet /
analyzed: hari pāda udakam yaḥ tu kṣaña mātram ca dhārayet

original: sa snātaḥ sarva-tṚrthesu viṣñoḥ priyataras tathā // Hbhv_9.73 //
analyzed: sa snātaḥ sarva tṛrthesu viṣñoḥ priyataraḥ tathā
sarva duḥkha upaśamanam hari pāda udakam śubham
tatra eva tad upākhyāna ante
hari pāda udaka sparśāt lubdhakaḥ vṛta kalmaṣaḥ

original: divyaṃ vimānam āruhya munim enam athābravṚt // Hbhv_9.75 //
analyzed: divyam vimānam āruhya munim enam atha abravṛt

original: hari-pādodakaṃ yasmān mayi tvaṃ kṣiptavān mune /
analyzed: hari pāda udakam yasmāt mayi tvam kṣiptavān mune

original: prāpito 'smi tvayā tasmāt tad viṣñoḥ paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_9.76 //
analyzed: prāpitaḥ smi tvayā tasmāt tat viṣñoḥ paramam padam

original: pādaṃ pūrvaṃ kila spṛṣṭvā gaŚgābhūt smartṛ-mokṣa-dā /
analyzed: pādam pūrvam kila spṛṣṭvā gaśgā abhūt smartṛ mokṣa dā

original: viṣñoḥ sadyas tu sat-saŚgi pādāmbu katham Ṛḍyate // Hbhv_9.77 //
analyzed: viṣñoḥ sadyas tu sat saśgi pāda ambu katham ṛḍyate
tāpa traya analaḥ yaḥ sau na śāmyet sakala abdhibhiḥ

original: sarvāŚgaiḥ sarvathā dhāryaṃ pādyaṃ śuci-padaḥ sadā // Hbhv_9.79 //
analyzed: sarva aśgaiḥ sarvathā dhāryam pādyam śuci padaḥ sadā
amṛta tva āvaham nityam viṣñu pāda ambu yaḥ pibet

original: sa pibaty amṛtaṃ nityaṃ māse māse tu devatāḥ // Hbhv_9.80 //
analyzed: sa pibati amṛtam nityam māse māse tu devatāḥ

original: māhātmyam iyad ity asya vaktā yo 'pi sa nirbhayaḥ /
analyzed: māhātmyam iyat iti asya vaktā sa nirbhayaḥ

original: nanv anargha-mañer mūlyaṃ kalpayann agham aśnute // Hbhv_9.81 //
analyzed: nanu anargha mañeḥ mūlyam kalpayan agham aśnute
anyatra api

original: sa brahmacārṚ sa vratṚ āśramṚ ca sadā-śuciḥ /
analyzed: sa brahmacārṛ sa vratṛ āśramṛ ca sadā aśuciḥ

original: viṣñu-pādodakaṃ yasya mukhe śirasi vigrahe // Hbhv_9.82 //
analyzed: viṣñu pāda udakam yasya mukhe śirasi vigrahe
janma prabhṛti pāpānām prāyaścittam yadṛcchati
śālagrāma śilāvari pāpa hāri niṣevyatām
atas eva tejodravinapañcaratre śrṛbrahmañā uktam
pṛṭha prañālāt udakam pṛthak ādāya putraka

original: siñcayen mūrdhni bhaktānāṃ sarva-tṚrtha-mayaṃ hi tat // Hbhv_9.84 // iti /
analyzed: siñcayet mūrdhni bhaktānām hi tat iti
pāda udakasya māhātmyam vikhyātam sarva śāstrataḥ

original: likhituṃ śaknuyat ko hi sindhūrmṚn gañayann api // Hbhv_9.85 //
analyzed: likhitum śaknuyat kaḥ hi sindhūrmṛd api
viśeṣataḥ ca pāda udam tulasṛ dala saṃyutam

original: śaŚkhe kṛtvā vaiṣñavebhyo dattvā prāgvat pibet svayam // Hbhv_9.86 //
analyzed: kṛtvā vaiṣñavebhyaḥ dattvā prāgvat pibet svayam
atha śaśkha kṛta pāda udaka māhātmyam
skānde śrṛ brahma nārada saṃvāde
kṛtvā pāda udakam śaśkhe vaiṣñavānām mahātmanām

original: yo dadyāt tulasṚ-miśraṃ cāndrāyaña-śataṃ labhet // Hbhv_9.87 //
analyzed: yaḥ dadyāt tulasṛ miśram cāndrāyaña śatam labhet

original: gṛhṚtvā kṛṣña-pādāmbu śaŚkhe kṛtvā tu vaiṣñavaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhṛtvā kṛṣña pāda ambu śaśkhe kṛtvā tu vaiṣñavaḥ

original: yo vahet śirasā nityaṃ sa munis tapasottamaḥ // Hbhv_9.88 //
analyzed: yaḥ vahet śirasā nityam sa muniḥ tapasā uttamaḥ
pādme deva dūta vikuñḍala saṃvāde
śālagrāma śilā toyam yadi pibet

original: hatyā-koṭi-vināśaṃ ca kurute nātra saṃsayaḥ // Hbhv_9.89 //
analyzed: hatyā koṭi vināśam ca kurute na atra saṃsayaḥ
agastyasaṃhitāyām

original: ye pibanti punas teṣāṃ stanya-pānaṃ na vidyate // Hbhv_9.90 // iti /
analyzed: ye pibanti punar teṣām stanya pānam na vidyate iti
śrṛviṣñoḥ vaiṣñavānām ca pāvanam carañā udakam

original: sarva-tṚrtha-mayaṃ pṚtvā kuryād ācamanaṃ na hi // Hbhv_9.91 //
analyzed: pṛtvā kuryāt ācamanam na hi
tat uktam skānde śivena
viṣñoḥ pāda udakam pṛtvā paścāt aśuci śaśkayā

original: ācamati ca yo mohād brahma-hā sa nigadyate // Hbhv_9.92 //
analyzed: ācamati ca yaḥ mohāt brahma hā sa nigadyate
srutiḥ ca
bhagavān pavitram bhagavat pādau pavitram
bhagavat pāda udakam pavitram
na tad pāne ācamanṛyam
yathā hi some iti
sauparñe ca
viṣñu pāda udakam pṛtvā bhakta pāda udakam tathā

original: ya ācamati saṃmohād brahma-hā sa nigadyate // Hbhv_9.94 // iti /
analyzed: yaḥ ācamati saṃmohāt brahma hā sa nigadyate iti
tatas śuddham gandha puṣpa akṣata anvitam
adhara upari sannyaset śaśkham bhagavat agratas
atha śrṛ bhagavat agratas
skānde brahma nārada saṃvāde śaśkha māhātmye
puratas vāsudevasya sa puṣpam sa jala akṣatam

original: śaŚkham abhyarcitaṃ paśyet tasya lakṣmṚr na durlabhā // Hbhv_9.96 //
analyzed: śaśkham abhyarcitam paśyet tasya lakṣmṛḥ na durlabhā
sa puṣpam vārijam yasya durvā akṣata samanvitam

original: purato vāsudevasya tasya śrṚḥ sarvato-mukhṚ // Hbhv_9.97 // iti /
analyzed: puratas vāsudevasya tasya śrṛḥ sarvatomukha iti
bhūtvā atha bhaktimān kānane prabhum
sampūjya abhyarcayet tam ca
atha śrṛ tula sṛ vana pūjā
prāk dattvā arghyam tatas vyarcya gandha puṣpa akṣata ādinā

original: stutvā bhagavatṚṃ tāṃ ca prañamet prārhtya dañḍavat // Hbhv_9.99 //
analyzed: stutvā bhagavatṛm tām ca prañamet prārhtya dañḍa vat
atha arghya mantraḥ

original: bhaktyā dattaṃ mayā devi arghyaṃ gṛhña namo 'stu te // Hbhv_9.100 //
analyzed: bhaktyā dattam mayā devi arghyam gṛhña namaḥ stu te
pūjā mantraḥ

original: nirmitā tvaṃ purā devair arcitā tvaṃ surāsuraiḥ /
analyzed: nirmitā tvam purā devaiḥ arcitā tvam sura asuraiḥ

original: tulasṚ hara me pāpaṃ pūjāṃ gṛhña namo 'stu te // Hbhv_9.101 //
analyzed: tulasṛ hara me pāpam pūjām gṛhña namaḥ stu te
stutiḥ ca

original: ādhi-vyādhi-haro nityaṃ tulasṚ tvaṃ namo 'stu te // Hbhv_9.102 //
analyzed: ādhi vyādhi haraḥ nityam tulasṛ tvam namaḥ stu te
prārthanā

original: śrṚyaṃ dehi yaśo dehi kṚrtim āyus tathā sukham /
analyzed: śrṛyam dehi yaśaḥ dehi kṛrtim āyuḥ tathā sukham

original: balaṃ puṣṭiṃ tathā dharmaṃ tulasṚ tvaṃ prasṚda me // Hbhv_9.103 //
analyzed: balam puṣṭim tathā dharmam tulasṛ tvam prasṛda me
prañāma vākyam
avantṛ khañḍe
yā dṛṣṭā nikhila agha saśgha śama nṛ spṛṣṭā vapuḥ pāva nṛ
rogāñām abhivanditā nirasinṛ sikta antaka trāsinṛ
bhagavataḥ kṛṣñasya saṃropitā

original: nyastā tac-carañe vimukti-phaladā tasyai tulasyai namaḥ // Hbhv_9.104 //
analyzed: nyastā tad carañe vimukti phala dā tasyai tulasyai namaḥ

original: lobhāt kūrditum icchāmi kṣudras tat kṣamyatāṃ tvayā // Hbhv_9.105 //
analyzed: lobhāt kūrditum icchāmi kṣudraḥ tat kṣamyatām tvayā
atha tulasi vana puja mahatmyam
skānde
śrāvaña dvādaśṛ yoge śālagrāma śilā arcane

original: yat phalaṃ saŚgame proktaṃ tulasṚ-pūjanena tat // Hbhv_9.107 //
analyzed: yat phalam saśgame proktam tulasṛ pūjanena tat
gāruḍe
dhātrṛ phalena yat puñyam jayantyām samupoṣañe

original: khagendra bhavate nṛñāṃ tulasṚ-pūjanena tat // Hbhv_9.107 //
analyzed: khaga indra bhavate nṛñām tulasṛ pūjanena tat
prayāga snāna niratau kasyām prāña vimokṣa ñe

original: yat phalaṃ vihitaṃ devais tulasṚ-pūjanena tat // Hbhv_9.108 //
analyzed: yat phalam vihitam devaiḥ tulasṛ pūjanena tat
agastyasaṃhitāyām

original: strṚñāṃ ca puruṣāñāṃ ca pūjiteṣṭaṃ dadāti hi // Hbhv_9.109 //
analyzed: ca puruṣāñām ca pūjita iṣṭam dadāti hi

original: tulasṚ ropitā siktā dṛṣṭā spṛṣṭā ca pāvayet /
analyzed: tulasṛ ropitā siktā dṛṣṭā spṛṣṭā ca pāvayet
ārādhitā prayatnena sarva kāma phala pradā
atha tulasṛvanapūjamāhātmyam

original: na teṣāṃ duritaṃ kiñcid akṣṚñam avaśiṣyate // Hbhv_9.111 //
analyzed: na teṣām duritam kiñcid akṣṛñam avaśiṣyate
bṛhat nāradiye yajña dhvaja upākhyāna ante

original: pūjyamānā ca tulasṚ yasya veśmani tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: pūjyamānā ca tulasṛ yasya veśmani tiṣṭhati

original: tasya sarvāñi śreyāṃsi vardhante 'har-ahar dvijāḥ // Hbhv_9.112 //
analyzed: tasya sarvāñi śreyāṃsi vardhante harahar dvijāḥ
atas eva pādme deva dūta vikuñḍala saṃvāde

original: pakṣe pakṣe tu samprāpte dvādaśyāṃ vaiśya-sattama /
analyzed: pakṣe pakṣe tu samprāpte dvādaśyām vaiśya sattama
brahma ādayaḥ pi kurvanti tulasṛ vana pūjanam
atas eva

original: ananya-manasā nityaṃ tulasṚṃ stauti yo naraḥ /
analyzed: an anya manasā nityam tulasṛm stauti yaḥ naraḥ
pitṛ deva manuṣyāñām priyaḥ bhavati sarvadā
atha tulasṛvana māhātmyam
skānde
ratim badhnāti na anyatra tulasṛ kānanam vinā
devadevaḥ kali kāle viśeṣataḥ
hitvā tṛrtha sahasrāñi sarvān api śilā uccayan

original: tulasṚ-kānane nityaṃ kalau tiṣṭhati keśavaḥ // Hbhv_9.116 //
analyzed: tulasṛ kānane nityam kalau tiṣṭhati keśavaḥ
naraiḥ yaiḥ tu tulasṛ vana vāṭikā

original: ropitā yaiś ca vidhinā samprāptaṃ paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_9.117 //
analyzed: ropitāḥ yaiḥ ca vidhinā samprāptam paramam padam

original: na dhātrṚ sa-phalā yatra na viṣñus tulasṚ-vanam /
analyzed: na dhātrṛ sa phalā yatra na viṣñuḥ tulasṛ vanam

original: tat śmaśāna-samaṃ sthānaṃ santi yatra na vaiṣñavāḥ // Hbhv_9.118 //
analyzed: tat śmaśāna samam sthānam santi yatra na vaiṣñavāḥ

original: keśavārthe kalau ye tu ropayantṚha bhū-tale /

original: kiṃ kariṣyaty asantuṣṭo yamo 'pi saha kiŚkaraiḥ // Hbhv_9.119 //
analyzed: kim kariṣyati a santuṣṭaḥ saha kiśkaraiḥ
tulasyāḥ ropañam kāryam śravañena viśeṣataḥ
aparādha sahasrāñi kṣamate puruṣottamaḥ

original: vāpayet tulasṚṃ puñyāṃ tat tṚrthaṃ cakra-pāñinaḥ // Hbhv_9.121 //
analyzed: vāpayet tulasṛm puñyām tat tṛrtham cakrapāñinaḥ
ghaṭaiḥ yantra ghaṭṛbhiḥ ca siñcitam tulasṛ vanam

tulasṛ gandham ādāya yatra gacchati mārutaḥ

original: diśo daśa ca pūtāḥ syur bhūta-grāmāś catur-vidhāḥ // Hbhv_9.123 //
analyzed: diśaḥ daśa ca pūtāḥ syuḥ bhūta grāmāḥ caturvidhāḥ
tulasṛ kānana udbhūtā chāyā yatra bhavet dvija

original: tatra śrāddhaṃ pradātavyam pitṄñāṃ tṛpti-hetave // Hbhv_9.124 //
analyzed: tatra śrāddham pradātavyam pitṅñām tṛpti hetave
tulasṛ bṛja nikarāḥ patate yatra nārada

original: piñḍa-dānaṃ kṛtaṃ tatra pitṄñāṃ dattam akṣayam // Hbhv_9.125 //
analyzed: piñḍa dānam kṛtam tatra pitṅñām dattam akṣayam
tatra eva agre

original: dṛṣṭā spṛṣṭā tathā dhyātā kṚrtitā namitā śrutā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭā spṛṣṭā tathā dhyātā kṛrtitā namitā śrutā

original: ropitā sevitā nityaṃ pūjitā tulasṚ śubhā // Hbhv_9.126 //
analyzed: ropitā sevitā nityam pūjitā tulasṛ śubhā

original: navadhā tulasṚṃ nityaṃ ye bhajanti dine dine /
analyzed: navadhā tulasṛm nityam ye bhajanti dine dine

original: yuga-koṭi-sahasrāñi te vasanti harer gṛhe // Hbhv_9.127 //
analyzed: yuga koṭi sahasrāñi te vasanti hareḥ gṛhe
ropitā tulasṛ yāvat kurute mūla vistaram

original: tāvat koṭi-sahasraṃ tu tanoti sukṛtaṃ kalau // Hbhv_9.128 //
analyzed: tāvat koṭi sahasram tu tanoti sukṛtam kalau
yāvat śākhā praśākhābhiḥ bṛja puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ mune

original: ropitā tulasṚ pumbhir vardhate vasudhā-tale // Hbhv_9.129 //
analyzed: ropitā tulasṛ pumbhiḥ vardhate vasudhā tale

original: kule teṣāṃ tu ye jātā ye bhaviṣyanti ye mṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kule teṣām tu ye jātāḥ ye bhaviṣyanti ye mṛtaḥ

original: ākalpaṃ yuga-sāhasraṃ teṣāṃ vāso harer gṛhe // Hbhv_9.130 //
analyzed: ākalpam yuga sāhasram teṣām vāsaḥ hareḥ gṛhe
tatra eva ca avantṛ khañḍe
tulasṛm ye vicinvanti dhanyāḥ tad karapallavāḥ

original: keśavārthe kalau ye ca ropayantṚha bhū-tale // Hbhv_9.131 //
analyzed: keśava arthe kalau ye ca bhū tale

original: snāne dāne tathā dhyāne prāśane keśavārcane /
analyzed: snāne dāne tathā dhyāne prāśane keśava arcane

original: tulasṚ dahate pāpaṃ ropañe kṚrtane kalau // Hbhv_9.132 //
analyzed: tulasṛ dahate pāpam ropañe kṛrtane kalau
kāśṛkhañḍe sva dūtān prati śrṛyamā anuśāsane

original: tulasṚ-vana-pālā ye te tyājyā dūrato bhaṭāḥ // Hbhv_9.133 //
analyzed: tulasṛ vana pālāḥ ye te tyājyāḥ dūratas bhaṭāḥ
tatra eva dhruvacarite
tulasṛ yasya bhavane pratyaham paripūjyate
tad gṛhe na upasarpanti kadācid yamakiśkarāḥ
pādme deva dūta vikuñḍala saṃvāde
na paśyanti yamam vaiśya
sarva pāpa haram sarva kāma dam tulasṛ vanam

original: tulasṚ-kānanaṃ vaiśya gṛhe yasmiṃs tu tiṣṭhate /
analyzed: tulasṛ kānanam vaiśya gṛhe yasmin tu tiṣṭhate

original: tad-gṛhaṃ tṚrthṚ-bhūtaṃ hi no yānti yama-kiŚkarāḥ // Hbhv_9.136 //
analyzed: tat gṛham tṛrthṛ bhūtam hi naḥ yānti yama kiśkarāḥ
tāvat varṣa sahasrāñi yāvat bṛja dalāni ca

original: māhātmyam api vijñeyaṃ likhyate'nyac ca tat kiyat // Hbhv_10.82 //
analyzed: māhātmyam api vijñeyam ca tat kiyat
atha bhagavat bhaktānām māhātmyam
sauparṇe śrī śakra uktau

original: kalau bhāgavataṃ nāma yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate /
analyzed: kalau bhāgavatam nāma yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate

original: jananī putriṇī tena pitṝṇāṃ tu dhurandharaḥ // Hbhv_10.83 //
analyzed: jananī putriṇī tena pitṝṇām tu dhurandharaḥ

original: kalau bhāgavataṃ nāma durlabhaṃ naiva labhyate /
analyzed: kalau bhāgavatam nāma durlabham nā eva labhyate

original: yasya bhāgavataṃ cihnaṃ dṛśyate tu harir mune /
analyzed: yasya bhāgavatam cihnam dṛśyate tu hariḥ mune

original: gīyate ca kalau devā jñeyās te nāsti saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.85 //
analyzed: gīyate ca kalau devāḥ jñeyāḥ te na asti saṃśayaḥ
śrī mārkaṇḍeya uktau

original: samīpe tiṣṭhate yasya ha anta-kāle'pi vaiṣṇavaḥ /
analyzed: samīpe tiṣṭhate yasya ha antakāle pi vaiṣṇavaḥ

original: gacchate paramaṃ sthānaṃ yadyapi brahmahā bhavet // Hbhv_10.86 //
analyzed: gacchate paramam sthānam yadi api brahma hā bhavet
nāradīye śrī vāmadeva rukmāṅgada saṃvāde nārp
śvapacaḥ pi mahīpāla viṣṇu bhaktaḥ dvija adhikaḥ
viṣṇu bhakti vihīnaḥ tu śvapaca adhikaḥ
skānde revākhaṇḍe śrī brahma uktau

original: indro maheśvaro brahmā paraṃ brahma tadaiva hi /
analyzed: indraḥ maheśvaraḥ brahmā param brahma tadā eva hi

original: śvapaco 'pi bhavaty eva yadā tuṣṭā'si keśava // Hbhv_10.88 //
analyzed: śvapacaḥ u pi bhavati eva yadā tuṣṭā asi keśava
śvapacāt api kaṣṭa tvam brahma īśāna ādayaḥ surāḥ

original: tadaivācyuta yānty ete yadaiva tvaṃ parāṅmukhaḥ // Hbhv_10.89 //
analyzed: tadā eva acyuta yānti ete yadā eva tvam parāṅmukhaḥ

original: sa kartā sarva-dharmāṇāṃ bhakto yas tava keśava /
analyzed: sa kartā sarva dharmāṇām bhaktaḥ yaḥ tava keśava

original: sa kartā sarva-pāpānāṃ yo na bhaktas tavācyuta // Hbhv_10.90 //
analyzed: sa kartā sarva pāpānām yaḥ na bhaktaḥ tava acyuta

original: dharmo bhavaty adharmo 'pi kṛto bhaktais tavācyuta /
analyzed: dharmaḥ bhavati kṛtaḥ bhaktaiḥ tava acyuta

original: pāpaṃ bhavati dharmo 'pi tavābhaktaiḥ kṛto hareḥ // Hbhv_10.91 //
analyzed: pāpam bhavati tava abhaktaiḥ kṛtaḥ hareḥ
niḥśeṣa dharma kartā vā api abhaktaḥ narake hare

original: sadā tiṣṭhati bhaktas te brahmahāpi viśudhyati // Hbhv_10.92 //
analyzed: sadā tiṣṭhati bhaktaḥ te brahma hā api viśudhyati

original: niścalā tvayi bhaktir yā saiva muktir janārdana /
analyzed: niścalā tvayi bhaktiḥ yā sā eva muktiḥ janārdana

original: muktā eva hi bhaktās te tava viṣṇo yato hare // Hbhv_10.93 //
analyzed: muktāḥ eva hi bhaktāḥ te tava viṣṇo yatas hare
tatra eva durvāsaḥ nārada saṃvāde
nūnam bhāgavatāḥ loke loka rakṣā viśāradāḥ

original: bhagavān eva sarvatra bhūtānāṃ kṛpayā hariḥ /
analyzed: bhagavān eva sarvatra bhūtānām kṛpayā hariḥ

original: rakṣaṇāya caran lokān bhakta-rūpeṇa nārada // Hbhv_10.95 //
analyzed: rakṣaṇāya caran lokān bhakta rūpeṇa nārada
tatra eva śrī brahma nārada saṃvāde

original: yas tu viṣṇu-paro nityaṃ dṛḍha-bhaktir jitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu viṣṇu paraḥ nityam dṛḍha bhaktiḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: sva-gṛhe'pi vasan yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // Hbhv_10.96 //
analyzed: sva gṛhe api vasan yāti tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam
aśvamedha sahasrāṇām sahasram yaḥ karoti vai

original: nāsau tat-phalam āpnoti tad-bhaktair yad avāpyate // Hbhv_10.97 //
analyzed: na asau tad phalam āpnoti tad bhaktaiḥ yat avāpyate

original: sarvatra vaiṣṇavāḥ pūjyāḥ svarge martye rasātale /
analyzed: sarvatra vaiṣṇavāḥ pūjyāḥ svarge martye rasātale
devatānām manuṣyāṇām tathā eva uraga rakṣasām

original: dahyante nātra sandeho vaiṣṇavānāṃ mahātmanām // Hbhv_10.99 //
analyzed: dahyante na atra sandehaḥ vaiṣṇavānām mahātmanām
yeṣām pāda rajena eva prāpyate jāhnavī jalam

original: nārmadaṃ yāmunaṃ caiva kiṃ punaḥ pādayor jalam // Hbhv_10.100 //
analyzed: nārmadam yāmunam ca eva kim punar pādayoḥ jalam
yeṣām vākya jala oghena vinā gaṅgā jalaiḥ api

original: vinā tīrtha-sahasreṇa snāto bhavati mānavaḥ // Hbhv_10.101 //
analyzed: vinā tīrtha sahasreṇa snātaḥ bhavati mānavaḥ
tatra eva cāturmāsya māhātmye
tāvat bhramanti saṃsāre pitaraḥ piṇḍa tatparaḥ

original: yāvat kule bhakti-yuktaḥ suto naiva prajāyate // Hbhv_10.102 //
analyzed: yāvat kule bhakti yuktaḥ sutaḥ nā eva prajāyate

original: sa eva jñānavān loke yogināṃ prathamo hi saḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva jñānavān loke yoginām prathamaḥ hi saḥ

original: mahā-kratūnām āhartā hari-bhakti-yuto hi yaḥ // Hbhv_10.103 //
analyzed: mahā kratūnām āhartā hari bhakti yutaḥ hi yaḥ
kāśīkhaṇḍe dhruvacarite

original: na cyavante hi yad-bhaktyā mahatyāṃ pralayāpadi /
analyzed: na cyavante hi yad bhaktyā mahatyām pralaya āpadi

original: ato 'cyuto 'khile loke sa ekaḥ sarvago 'vyayaḥ // Hbhv_10.104 //
analyzed: atas cyutaḥ khile loke saḥ ekaḥ sarva gaḥ vyayaḥ

original: na tasmād bhagavad-bhaktād bhetavyaṃ kenacit kvacit /
analyzed: na tasmāt bhagavat bhaktāt bhetavyam kenacid kvacid

original: niyataṃ viṣṇu-bhaktā yena te syuḥ para-tāpinaḥ // Hbhv_10.105 //
analyzed: niyatam viṣṇu bhaktāḥ yena te syuḥ para tāpinaḥ
tatra eva agre

original: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā yadi vetaraḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ vā yadi vā itaraḥ
viṣṇu bhakti samāyuktaḥ jñeyaḥ sarva uttama uttamaḥ
śaṅkha cakra aṅkita tanuḥ śirasā mañjarī dharaḥ

original: gopī-candana-liptāṅgo dṛṣṭaś ced tad-aghaṃ kutaḥ // Hbhv_10.107 //
analyzed: gopīcandana lipta aṅgaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ced tad agham kutas
mahābhārate rāja dharme
īśvaram sarva bhūtānām jagataḥ prabhava apyayam

original: bhaktā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ durgāṇy atitaranti te // Hbhv_10.108 //
analyzed: bhaktāḥ nārāyaṇam devam durgāṇi atitaranti te
viṣṇudharmottare

original: śayanād utthito yas tu kīrtayen madhusūdanam /
analyzed: śayanāt utthitaḥ yaḥ tu kīrtayet madhusūdanam

original: kīrtanāt tasya pāpāni nāśam āyānty aśeṣataḥ // Hbhv_10.109 //
analyzed: kīrtanāt tasya pāpāni nāśam āyānti aśeṣatas
tatra eva
yasya api anante jagatām adhīśe
bhaktiḥ parā yādava deva deve
tasmāt param na aparam asti kiñcid
pātram triloke puruṣa pravīra
dvārakāmāhātmye śrī prahlāda bali saṃvāde

original: nityaṃ ye prātar utthāya vaiṣṇavānāṃ tu kīrtanam /
analyzed: nityam ye prātar utthāya vaiṣṇavānām tu kīrtanam

original: kurvanti te bhāgavatāḥ kṛṣṇa-tulyāḥ kalau bale // Hbhv_10.111 //
analyzed: kurvanti te bhāgavatāḥ kṛṣṇa tulyāḥ kalau bale
sva darśana sparśana pūjanaiḥ kṛtī
tamāṃsi viṣṇu pratimā iva vaiṣṇavaḥ

original: dhunvan vasaty atra janasya yan na tat
analyzed: dhunvan vasati atra janasya yat na tat
sva artham param loka hitāya dīpa vat
itihāsasamuccaye śrī lomaśa vākye
ye bhajanti jagadyonim vāsudevam sanātanam

original: na tebhyo vidyate tīrtham adhikaṃ rāja-sattama // Hbhv_10.113 //
analyzed: na tebhyaḥ vidyate tīrtham adhikam rāja sattama
yatra bhāgavatāḥ snānam kurvanti vimala āśrayāḥ
tat tīrtham adhikam viddhi sarva pāpa viśodhanam

original: tatra sannihito viṣṇur nṛpate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.115 //
analyzed: tatra sannihitaḥ viṣṇuḥ nṛpate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: na gandhair na tathā toyair na puṣpaiś ca manoharaiḥ /
analyzed: na gandhaiḥ na tathā toyaiḥ na puṣpaiḥ ca manoharaiḥ

original: sānnidhyaṃ kurute devo yatra santi na vaiṣṇavāḥ // Hbhv_10.116 //
analyzed: sānnidhyam kurute devaḥ yatra santi na vaiṣṇavāḥ

original: nityam ārādhyamāno 'pi tatra viṣṇur na tṛpyati // Hbhv_10.117 //
analyzed: nityam ārādhyamānaḥ u pi tatra viṣṇuḥ na tṛpyati
tasmāt ete mahābhāgāḥ vaiṣṇavāḥ vīta kalmaṣāḥ

original: punanti sakalān lokāṃs tat tīrtham adhikaṃ tataḥ // Hbhv_10.118 //
analyzed: punanti sakalān lokān tat tīrtham adhikam tatas

original: śūdraṃ vā bhagavad-bhaktaṃ niṣādaṃ śvapacaṃ tathā /
analyzed: śūdram vā bhagavat bhaktam niṣādam śvapacam tathā

original: vīkṣataṃ jāti-sāmānyāt sa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam // Hbhv_10.119 //
analyzed: vīkṣatam jāti sāmānyāt sa yāti narakam dhruvam
tasmāt viṣṇu prasādāya vaiṣṇavān paritoṣayet

original: prasāda-sumukho viṣṇus tenaiva syān na saṃśayaḥ // Hbhv_10.120 //
analyzed: prasāda su mukhaḥ viṣṇuḥ tena eva syāt na saṃśayaḥ

ye nṛśaṃsāḥ durātmānaḥ pāpa ācāra ratāḥ sadā

original: te'pi yānti paraṃ dhāma nārāyaṇa-parāśrayāḥ // Hbhv_10.121 //
analyzed: te api yānti param dhāma nārāyaṇa para āśrayāḥ

original: lipyante na ca pāpena vaiṣṇavā viṣṇu-tat-parāḥ /
analyzed: lipyante na ca pāpena vaiṣṇavāḥ viṣṇu tatparāḥ

original: punanti sakalān lokān sahasrāṃśur ivoditaḥ // Hbhv_10.122 //
analyzed: punanti sakalān lokān sahasrāṃśuḥ iva uditaḥ
janma antara sahasreṣu yasya syāt buddhiḥ īdṛśī

original: dāso 'haṃ vāsudevasya sarvān lokān samuddharet // Hbhv_10.123 //
analyzed: dāsaḥ ham vāsudevasya sarvān lokān samuddharet

original: sa yāti viṣṇu-sālokyaṃ puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sa yāti viṣṇu sālokyam puruṣaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: kiṃ punas tad-gata-prāṇāḥ puruṣāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ // Hbhv_10.124 //
analyzed: kim punar tad gata prāṇāḥ puruṣāḥ saṃyata indriyāḥ

original: smṛtaḥ sambhāṣito vāpi pūjito vā dvijottamāḥ /
analyzed: smṛtaḥ sambhāṣitaḥ vā api pūjitaḥ vā dvijottamāḥ
punāti bhagavat bhaktaḥ cāṇḍālaḥ pi yadṛcchayā
śrī vyāsa vākye
janma antara sahasreṣu viṣṇu bhaktaḥ na lipyate

original: yasya sandarśanād eva bhasmībhavati pātakam // Hbhv_10.126 //
analyzed: yasya sandarśanāt eva bhasmībhavati pātakam
itihāsasamuccaye śrī bhagavat vākye

original: na me priyaś caturvedī mad-bhaktaḥ śvapacaḥ priyaḥ /
analyzed: na me priyaḥ caturvedī mad bhaktaḥ śvapacaḥ priyaḥ

original: tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hy aham // Hbhv_10.127 //
analyzed: tasmai deyam tatas grāhyam sa ca pūjyaḥ yathā hi aham
tatra eva brahma vākye

original: sabhartṛkā vā vidhavā viṣṇu-bhaktiṃ karoti yā /
analyzed: sa bhartṛkā vā vidhavā viṣṇu bhaktim karoti yā

original: samuddharati cātmānaṃ kulam ekottaraṃ śatam // Hbhv_10.128 //
analyzed: samuddharati ca ātmānam kulam eka uttaram śatam
dvārakāmāhātmye prahlāda bali saṃvāde

original: mleccha-tulyāḥ kulīnās te ye na bhaktā janārdane // Hbhv_10.129 //
analyzed: mleccha tulyāḥ kulīnāḥ te ye na bhaktāḥ janārdane
ādipurāṇe śrī kṛṣṇa arjuna saṃvāde
vaiṣṇavān bhaja kaunteya mā bhajasva anya devatāḥ

original: punanti vaiṣṇavāḥ sarve sarva-devam idaṃ jagat /
analyzed: punanti vaiṣṇavāḥ sarve sarva devam idam jagat

original: mad-bhakto durlabho yasya sa eva mama durlabhaḥ // Hbhv_10.130 //
analyzed: mad bhaktaḥ durlabhaḥ yasya saḥ eva mama durlabhaḥ

original: tat-paro durlabho nāsti satyaṃ satyaṃ dhanañjaya /
analyzed: tad paraḥ durlabhaḥ nā asti satyam satyam dhanañjaya

original: jagatāṃ guravo bhaktā bhaktānāṃ guravo vayam /
analyzed: jagatām guravaḥ bhaktāḥ bhaktānām guravaḥ vayam

original: sarvatra guravo bhaktā vayaṃ ca guravo yathā /
analyzed: sarvatra guravaḥ bhaktāḥ vayam ca guravaḥ yathā

original: asmākaṃ bāndhavā bhaktā bhaktānāṃ bāndhavā vayam // Hbhv_10.131 //
analyzed: asmākam bāndhavāḥ bhaktāḥ bhaktānām bāndhavāḥ vayam

original: asmākaṃ guravo bhaktā bhaktānāṃ guravo vayam /
analyzed: asmākam guravaḥ bhaktāḥ bhaktānām guravaḥ vayam

original: mad-bhaktā yatra gacchanti tatra gacchāmi pārthiva /
analyzed: mad bhaktāḥ yatra gacchanti tatra gacchāmi pārthiva

original: bhaktānām anugacchanti muktayaḥ śrutibhiḥ saha // Hbhv_10.132 //
analyzed: bhaktānām anugacchanti muktayaḥ śrutibhiḥ saha

original: ye me bhakta-janāḥ pārtha na me bhaktāś ca te janāḥ /
analyzed: ye me bhakta janāḥ pārtha na me bhaktāḥ ca te janāḥ

original: mad-bhaktānāṃ ca ye bhaktās te me bhaktatamā matāḥ // Hbhv_10.133 //
analyzed: mad bhaktānām ca ye bhaktāḥ te me bhaktatamāḥ matāḥ

original: ye kecit prāṇino bhaktā mad-arthe tyakta-bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: ye kecid prāṇinaḥ bhaktāḥ mad arthe tyakta bāndhavāḥ

original: teṣām ahaṃ parikrīto nānya-krīto dhanañjaya // Hbhv_10.134 //
analyzed: teṣām aham parikrītaḥ na anya krītaḥ dhanañjaya

original: eṣāṃ bhakṣyaṃ sunirṇītaṃ śrūyatāṃ niścitaṃ mama /
analyzed: eṣām bhakṣyam su nirṇītam śrūyatām niścitam mama

original: ucchiṣṭam avaśiṣṭaṃ ca bhaktānāṃ bhojana-dvayam // Hbhv_10.135 //
analyzed: ucchiṣṭam avaśiṣṭam ca bhaktānām bhojana dvayam

original: kurvanti me yathā prītiṃ na tathā veda-pāragāḥ // Hbhv_10.136 //
analyzed: kurvanti me yathā prītim na tathā vedapāragāḥ
bṛhat nāradīye mārkaṇḍeyam prati śrī bhagavat uktau

original: tad eva pālayiṣyāmi majjano nānṛtaṃ vadet // Hbhv_10.137 //
analyzed: tat eva pālayiṣyāmi mad janaḥ na anṛtam vadet

original: mama janma kule yasya tat kulaṃ mokṣagāmi vai /
analyzed: mama janma kule yasya tat kulam mokṣa gāmi vai

original: mayi tuṣṭe muni-śreṣṭha kim asādhyaṃ jagat-traye // Hbhv_10.138 //
analyzed: mayi tuṣṭe muni śreṣṭha kim asādhyam jagattraye

original: mayi bhakti-paro yas tu mad-yājī mat-kathā-paraḥ /
analyzed: mayi bhakti paraḥ yaḥ tu mad yājī mad kathā paraḥ

original: mad-dhyānī sva-kulaṃ sarvaṃ nayaty acyuta-rūpatām // Hbhv_10.139 //
analyzed: mad dhyānī sva kulam sarvam nayati acyuta rūpa tām
mad artham karma kurvāṇaḥ mad praṇāma paraḥ naraḥ

original: man-manāḥ sva-kulaṃ sarvaṃ nayaty acyuta-rūpatām // Hbhv_10.140 //
analyzed: mad manāḥ sva kulam sarvam nayati acyuta rūpa tām
aham eva dvijaśreṣṭha nityam pracchanna vigrahaḥ
bhagavat bhakta rūpeṇa lokān rakṣāmi sarvadā
tatra eva aditimāhātmye śrī sūta uktau
viprāḥ śṛṇudhvam māhātmyam hari bhakti rata ātmanām

original: hari-dhyāna-parāṇāṃ tu kaḥ samarthaḥ prabādhitum // Hbhv_10.142 //
analyzed: hari dhyāna parāṇām tu kaḥ samarthaḥ prabādhitum

original: hari-bhakti-paro yatra tatra brahmā hariḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: hari bhakti paraḥ yatra tatra brahmā hariḥ śivaḥ

original: tatra devāś ca siddhādyā nityaṃ tiṣṭhanti sattamāḥ // Hbhv_10.143 //
analyzed: tatra devāḥ ca siddha ādyāḥ nityam tiṣṭhanti sattamāḥ

original: nimiṣaṃ nimṣārdhaṃ vā yatra tiṣṭhanti sattamāḥ /
analyzed: nimiṣam nimṣa ardham vā yatra tiṣṭhanti sattamāḥ

original: tatraiva sarva-śreyāṃsi tat tīrthaṃ tat tapo-vanam // Hbhv_10.144 //
analyzed: tatra eva sarva śreyāṃsi tat tīrtham tat tapovanam
tatra eva aditim prati śrī bhagavat uttare
rāga dveṣa vihīnāḥ ye mad bhaktāḥ mad parāyaṇāḥ

original: vadanti satataṃ te māṃ gatāsūyā adāmbhikāḥ // Hbhv_10.145 //
analyzed: vadanti satatam te mām gata asūyāḥ a dāmbhikāḥ
para upatāpa vimukhāḥ śiva bhakti parāyaṇāḥ

original: mat-kathā-śravaṇāsaktā vahanti satataṃ hi mām // Hbhv_10.146 //
analyzed: mad kathā śravaṇa āsaktāḥ vahanti satatam hi mām
